document_data.mainbody:
orah was the wife of Vladek, the owner of the Sloop in Mulsantir in Rashemen during the late 14 century DR.
Zorah was a tall and muscled half-orcish woman even among her kin. She had a facial tattoo adorning her forehead. She had a stoic and intimidating face that softened every time her eyes laid on Vladek.
Several years before the , Zorah and her human husband, the innkeeper named Vladek, bought the Sloop. They turned what used to be an unprofitable glorified museum into a tavern and an inn. Zorah manned the establishments doors, ensuring there was no trouble and handled rowdy drunks, while Vladek handled the bar.
